about_the_game:
School simulation game 2022 edition

Achieved 1 million downloads for the entire series

A school simulator game that recreates a girls' school with cherry blossoms on a small anime-style island.
You control the yandere-like protagonist and attend classes, participate in club activities, buy sweets, and go to the beach.
You can also eat and drink at cafes, sushi restaurants, and restaurants on the beach.
You can also play together at the new amusement park attractions.

Club activities include a soccer club, rugby club, and basketball club.
You can also confess to increase your likeability.

・Method of operation
(keyboard operation)
A: Move left
D: Move right
W: Move up
S: Move back

[Shift] Run
[Space] Jump
[T] Talk to people nearby
[F] Use the items you have
[Q] Pick up nearby items/Release items

[F1] Menu
[F2] Change clothes
[F3] Action
[F4] Fly in the sky

(Mouse operation)
Mouse L Click + Mouse Move: Camera Move


・School timetable
8:30-9:00. School attendance
9:00-9:40　1st hour
10:00-10:40 2nd hour
11:00-11:40 3rd hour
12:00-13:00 Lunch
13:00-13:40 4th hour
14:00-14:40 5th hour
15:00-15:40 6th hour
15:40-18:00 Club activity time
18:00- Return home
